channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Treasury and Risk Management (S4CORE)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Treasury and Risk Management (S4CORE)

item.title: CVE-2019-0384|2024-08-04T17:51:27.032Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20treasury%20and%20risk%20management%20%28s4core%29
item.description: Transaction Management in SAP Treasury and Risk Management (corrected in S4CORE versions 1.01, 1.02, 1.03, 1.04 and EA-FINSERV versions 6.0, 6.03, 6.04, 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0) does not perform necessary authorization checks for functionalities that require user identity.

item.title: CVE-2019-0383|2024-08-04T17:51:26.142Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20treasury%20and%20risk%20management%20%28s4core%29
item.description: Transaction Management in SAP Treasury and Risk Management (corrected in S4CORE versions 1.01, 1.02, 1.03, 1.04 and EA-FINSERV versions 6.0, 6.03, 6.04, 6.05, 6.06, 6.16, 6.17, 6.18, 8.0) does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
